Name: Illyriad - Grand Strategy MMO
About the game: Forge Alliances with thousands of players. Craft and Trade 380+ resources and items in an entirely player driven market , across a vast, varied world. Side with 100+ warring NPC factions and their 700+ unit types. Illyriad comes with more than 525+ Steam Achievements! Research 400+ technologies, and build 70+ building types to create your own specialised cities. Gather exotic resources, craft rare items, master mighty magics, command thieves and assassins, explore and settle new lands in the 8.6 million square world of Illyriad ® . Illyriad is a strategy game of extraordinary depth and variety. With a great community, multiple paths for city specialisation, and frequent updates and new releases, this is a vast fantasy world where you can be the kind of ruler that you wish to be. 'Solid and deep MMO play experience. This is certainly a sweeping, epic strategy game.' – Independent Games Festival Build, plan, gather, craft, trade, scheme and fight in this strategy epic!
